descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

symbols.name: symbols
symbols.description: One or multiple comma-separated stock symbols (tickers) to retrieve, e.g. AAPL or AAPL,MSFT
symbols.ai_hint: One or multiple comma-separated stock symbols (tickers) to retrieve, e.g. AAPL or AAPL,MSFT

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: exchange
options.description: Stock exchange to filter results by, specified by Market Identifier Code, e.g. XNAS

options.name: latest
options.description: Whether to fetch the most recent stock market data

options.name: specificDate
options.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2020-01-01, or in ISO-8601 date format, e.g. 2020-05-21T00:00:00+0000

options.name: dateFrom
options.description: Timeframe start date in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2020-01-01, or in ISO-8601 date format, e.g. 2020-05-21T00:00:00+0000

options.name: dateTo
options.description: Timeframe end date in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2020-01-01, or in ISO-8601 date format, e.g. 2020-05-21T00:00:00+0000

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

exchange.name: exchange
exchange.description: Stock exchange to retrieve, specified by Market Identifier Code, e.g. XNAS
exchange.ai_hint: Stock exchange to retrieve, specified by Market Identifier Code, e.g. XNAS

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'endOfDayData' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'symbols'
IF resource == 'endOfDayData' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'endOfDayData' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'endOfDayData' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'exchange' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'exchange'
IF resource == 'ticker' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'symbol'
